title: Aram Tournament by Summoners' Society

embed.description: Games event by Summoners Society on Monday, April 8 2019

body:
Hello Summoners,

Welcome to our ARAM tournament. 

Check list
Read the rules 
Have gained the discord link and joined the server
Sign up the team for battlefy

Event details
8th of April 2019 6pm

Date:08/04/2019
Time:6:00pm

Check In: 5:00pm
Check ends:6:00pm

Check is done on battlefy

Sign up on Battlefy
https://battlefy.com/summonerssociety/summoners-society-aram-tournament/5c946ccbfb6cea032c2a0724/info?infoTab=details


Join the discord
https://discord.gg/kDaQ7D3


Bracket: Single Elimination
Matches: Best of One. 
Map: Howling Abyss
Bracket is out: 6:05-6:10pm

After that games will happen as soon as they can. 
When you come out of game it is up to you to check the bracket and see if the next team is ready. If both teams are out of game and only you are in lobby, please contact the team in discord. (We use discord for this purpose).

How to get tournament code
Go to bracket, click on your game and scroll down to the section that says tournament code.  


All contact must be made on the Summoners Society Discord under #helpme. Please donâ€™t pm admins, as not all admins are working that day and information gets lost! You should only pm admin if someone is being toxic towards you. 

Rules
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Knefe_DHNoUzZgq1AXPO9Drm8zr7z5sehJ3p5HgB2aA/edit?usp=sharing 
Prizing:https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/bWtno6fE-tournament-prizing-how-does-it-work


Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/
